description:
http://anidb.net/ch67152 [Melodias], http://anidb.net/ch67154 [Hawk], and http://anidb.net/ch67153 [Elizabeth] retook the Kingdom of Leones from the Holy Knights. The festival went off without a hitch and the crew enjoyed their well-earned peace. And yet, another threat looms on the horizon. The Ten Commandments, a group of elite demon clan warriors, have their sights set on the kingdom.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
As the kingdom begins to rebuild after the coup attempt, the king honors the Seven Deadly Sins for their bravery with a medal ceremony.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Le retour du clan des démons

REGULAR.description:
With Fraudrin`s manipulation of Hendrickson, the Ten Commandments return to the physical realm. King follows Ban to the Fairy King`s Forest.
Source: Netflix

Diane confronts Gowther after he manipulates Guila and Zeal`s memories. With the return of the Demon Clan, new threats descend upon allied clans.
Source: Netflix

King struggles to fend off the giant Albion sent to destroy the Fairy King`s Forest. Galand of the Ten Commandments appears before Meliodas.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: The Ten Commandments on the Move

REGULAR.description:
The fairies reconcile their differences with King as Ban leaves the forest. Meanwhile, Meliodas and gang are overwhelmed by the sheer power of Galand.
Source: Netflix

Hendrickson, thought to have been defeated in a battle against Meliodas, aids Gilthunder and the Holy Knights against a powerful Gray Demon.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Der Anführer der Heiligen Ritter büßt für seine Sünden

REGULAR.description:
An injured Diane awakens, having trouble remembering her comrades. With her memories fading, she heads for Megadoza, home of the Giant Clan.
Source: Netflix

Meliodas and others head to Megadozer in hopes of finding Diane. Meanwhile, a confused Diane encounters Galand of the Ten Commandments once again.
Source: Netflix

Acknowledging his lack of strength to face the Ten Commandments, Meliodas vigorously trains with the Druids of Istar to regain his sealed powers back.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Ai Suru Mono to no Yakusoku
La Promesse Faite à Celle Que J’aime
The Promise with the Loved One

REGULAR.description:
Ban reflects on his past after returning to his childhood home in Ravens. Meliodas`s allies train for their inevitable war with the Ten Commandments.
Source: Netflix

A frail Zhivago reunites with Ban, his long-lost adopted son. Meanwhile, a wary King confronts Meliodas about his true intentions.
Source: Netflix

After a brief encounter with Meliodas, the Ten Commandments begin their attack on Britannia. A resurrected Elaine appears before Ban.
Source: Netflix

A revived but possessed Elaine attacks her lover, Ban, as Melascula and Galand of the Ten Commandments emerge to destroy those in their path.
Source: Netflix

Jericho carries severely injured Ban and Elaine on her back while escaping from Galand and Melascula before stumbling into a bar deep inside a cave.
Source: Netflix

Gloxinia and Drole of the Ten Commandments lure strong fighters to Vaizel by offering to grant any wish to the winner of their Great Fight Festival.
Source: Netflix

An elaborate trap-laden deadly maze constructed by Drole begins to weed out the weaker challengers that have gathered for the Great Fight Festival.
Source: Netflix

The surviving challengers of the Great Fight Festival are split into pairs and made to face each other in a tag team battle.
Source: Netflix

King and Diane continue their battle against opponents summoned by Gloxinia and Drole. Escanor refuses to fight against his fellow ally Gowther.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Cette lumière pour le bien d`un autre
For Whom Doeth That Light Shine?
Sono Hikari wa Ta ga Tame ni

REGULAR.description:
As Escanor`s battle with Gowther comes to a dramatic end, Meliodas must now face the remaining Ten Commandments in an all-out battle.
Source: Netflix

With Meliodas rendered powerless, Ban asks to be transported back so he can aid him in his fight against Estarossa and the other Ten Commandments.
Source: Netflix

While caring for Meliodas, Elizabeth encounters a former Great Holy Knight thought to have perished long ago by the hands of Dreyfus and Hendrickson.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: たしかな ぬくもり

REGULAR.description:
With Ban and the Holy Knights paralyzed by Estarossa’s powers, Escanor shows up to thwart the fall of Liones at the hands of the Ten Commandments.
Source: Netflix

As the situation inside Liones Castle becomes even more dire, Merlin, freed from Galand`s Commandment of Truth, reappears in her former form.
Source: Netflix

Determined to kill his former leader for betraying their clan 3,000 years ago, Fraudrin takes on a newly resurrected darker, more powerful Meliodas.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: As Long As You Are Here
Nanatsu no Taizai: Imashime no Fukkatsu - Joshou
The Seven Deadly Sins: Revival of the Commandments - Prologue
七つの大罪 戒めの復活 -序章-
Nanatsu no Taizai: Imashime no Fukkatsu
The Seven Deadly Sins - Il ritorno dei Dieci Comandamenti
The Seven Deadly Sins : Le retour des commandements
The Seven Deadly Sins: Die Rückkehr der Gebote
The Seven Deadly Sins: Käskyjen uusi kukoistus
The Seven Deadly Sins: Odrodzenie Przykazań
The Seven Deadly Sins: Revival of the Commandments
תחיית עשר הדיברות :The Seven Deadly Sins
七つの大罪 The Seven Deadly Sins 戒めの復活
七大罪 戒律的复活
Nanatsu no Taizai - Imashime no Fukkatsu
שבעת חטאי המוות: תחיית עשר הדיברות
